name: Spotlight (Kevintis)
description:
Follow the white spotlights to reach the yellow finishline. Your Camera does not rotate with your movement. Up always stays up, down always stays down, right always stays right and left always stays left.

Controls:
W / Up arrow: Move Up
S / Down arrow: Move down
D / Right arrow: Move right
A / Left arrow: Move left

The levels are procedurally generated to always have a fresh experience.

Unfortunately I didn't have enough time to include more appealing visuals or sounds in general. They will be updated later on. This is the first game I ever made and I would love to hear your feedback!
